channel.title: Latest News on Vultursec | Security in your hand

item.title: Android Game Hacking Series - Level 3
item.description: Introduction to Android Game Hacking and its techniques. Hello everyone! Here is our third post on Android Game Hacking.

item.title: Reflection of Hack on Fractured Online
item.description: Greetings, all! I’m excited to share a post that delves into the aftermath of a recent security incident involving the game Fractured Online.

item.title: Android Game Hacking Series - Level 2
item.description: Introduction to Android Game Hacking and its techniques. Hello everyone! Here is our second post on Android Game Hacking.

item.title: Android Game Hacking Series - Level 1
item.description: Introduction to Android Game Hacking and its techniques. Hello everyone! Starting with game hacking is hard, and trying to start in mobile game hacking is harder.

item.title: VulturSec Cloud Methodology
item.description: Cloud security assessments focus on the infrastructure of a company or application deployed in a cloud vendor.

item.title: VulturSec Mobile Methodology
item.description: Mobile penetration testing is different than traditional penetration testing, just like mobile applications are different than traditional ones.

item.title: VulturSec Red Team Methodology
item.description: Red Team Assessments are highly precise assessments with the objective of compromise critical assets in our customers network, with any possible technique available.

item.title: VulturSec SDLC Methodology
item.description: A long time ago security was a desired aspect on any application, sometimes it was seen as an optional feature as it was thought that it didn’t add any value to the product.

item.title: VulturSec Web Methodology
item.description: Web applications are the core of todayâ€™s software. From webapps in highly scalable AWS environments with multiple microservices running to legacy apps in more traditional infrastructures, the VulturSec team helps to secure data across the world.
